alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; McCook; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:41PM MDT until June 20 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MINNEHAHA...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...SOUTHEASTERN MCCOOK AND NORTHEASTERN TURNER COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wall Lake, or 10 miles east of Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sioux Falls, Hartford, Wall Lake, Humboldt, Monroe and Ellis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
